attributes.action: Send a team of scientists and historians back to the moon or to mars and do filmed research.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i think that as our planet gets older and more damaged, this is the time that we should be teaming up with other countries and send the top scientists and historians up to either the moon or mars and looks for ways man can set up homes and ETC. for somewhere to go and carry on man kind and just get more info on them.
